UNTDID7187Type.title: Process type description code
UNTDID7187Type.description:
Code specifying a type of process.

Applicable codes:
* '1' - Wood preparation
* '2' - Causticizing
* '3' - Digesting
* '4' - Brownstock washing
* '5' - Bleaching
* '6' - Pulp drying
* '7' - Freezing
* '8' - Processing of structured information
